attributes.action: Keep schools open, protect kids' futures, livelihoods and mental health
attributes.background: This is in opposition to the Reclose Schools petition.  Keep schools open during lockdown.   With limited education and no interaction with their peers, closing schools will mean many children will suffer physical and mental health problems  This will ultimately cause more long-term damage than CV19

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
